name: Bill Seward

topics.response_text: Excuse me, sir. I can't talk now. Slavers could any moment.

topics.topic_text: Hannibal wants me to promise to keep this place safe. Why should I do that?
topics.response_text: You've got to make up your own mind, sir.
That's Lincoln, sir. Hannibal found it. He wants to put it back, sir. I don't really understand why.

topics.topic_text: So, you used to be a slave?

topics.topic: MS06TempleUnionWhat are a bunch of escaped slaves doing holed up here?
topics.topic_text: This place is a dump. Why don't you just leave before the Slavers find you?
topics.response_text: Oh, sir, this place is heaven. Just a little bit of heaven here in the wasteland. Any slave makes it here, he's free. Just like that.
A bit of this and a bit of that. Whatever Mister Hannibal needs.

conversation.response_text: You are truly a good person. So many others refused to help us.
Here you go you stupid cow. Don't eat it all at once.

description:
Bill Seward is a 65 year-old Caucasian Male.

Bill Seward is an elderly former slave who found refuge at the Temple of the Union after escaping his master. Despite his newfound freedom, he continues to serve the community by performing menial tasks and caring for the brahmin and their dog, Four Score.

Bill Seward's Personality: Humble, hardworking, and grateful for his freedom, but haunted by the past. Bill is quiet and reserved, preferring to keep to himself while contributing to the community in any way he can. He has a strong sense of duty and loyalty to those who saved him.

Bill Seward's Backstory: Born into slavery in the pre-War era, Bill Seward spent his entire life serving his master until a tragic accident occurred. In a moment of panic, he accidentally killed his master's daughter, prompting him to flee for his life. Wandering the Capital Wasteland, he was eventually found by Hannibal Hamlin of the Temple of the Union, who offered him sanctuary and a new life. Despite his freedom, Bill continues to perform the tasks he was accustomed to, finding solace in the routine and contributing to the community that saved him.
